Chinese got a saying 锦上添花 means means adding flowers to brocade. The flowers for China cars r Advanced tech like large screens  AI assistants  and driver aids. Luxurious interiors with ambient lighting n premium materials. Sleek design  eye-catching styling  n  smart gadgets.
The issue with these cina cars is they pile on the "flowers"—flashy features—without perfecting the "brocade"—the fundamentals.
Brocade refer to Build Quality & Reliability  Engineering Excellence  Safety & Structural Integrity Driving Dynamics Efficiency & Powertrain Reliability
These fundamental area is where Cina cars have big issues
The Google review quite bad bro lol
For those driving cina cars  do yall experience this?

Rented a brand new GWM Wey 5 when overseas. Interior built quality is ok. But the tech really not that reliable. Unsure if it is due to the cold weather. But sometimes car is unable to start. The regen is also not that good. Mileage is much shorter than what was stated

Car dont seems to grab on the road when driving on highway. Seems like the weight distribution wasnt done well enough compared to contis. Onboard Nav  AA/CP wasnt working. Torque is good but acceleration was quite slow. 4.9m long but the interior is not very spacious (comparing to Model Y). Overall the impression it gave me was kinda bad.
When i go i feel they okay ah hahaha i got see the reviews also 😂😂

Doode lexus tolerance level i expect to be until 300k

I rather overhaul some parts now than to have it break down on me
U wanna do preventative maintenance u also change out thr wear n tear first
Even if u die die wnana overhaul

But i dont know if they got offer preventative maintenance
I recommend u change tyres brake pad  rotors and Water Pump and mounts
^ idk JDM cars well but do gb oil change fluid change
Okay thanks i will check with them and other workshops
Since u no servicing records all the fluids lup n change new one
Usually like this cost how much
Okay no problem thanks for answering 🙏
Engine oil 100 coolant u expect 300-400 GB oil also same
Engine overhaul  change arms  change fuel pump
